name: SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_IC
description: When in combat and timer at the begining between {pram1} and {pram2} ms (and later repeats every {pram3} and {pram4} ms)

name: SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_OOC
description: When out of combat and timer at the begining between {pram1} and {pram2} ms (and later repeats every {pram3} and {pram4} ms)

name: SMART_EVENT_HEALT_PCT

parameters.name: Repeat Minimum
parameters.description: Core will check whether this event should fire every min - max milliseconds

parameters.name: Repeat Maximum

description: When health between {pram1} and {pram2} (check every {pram3} - {pram4} ms)

name: SMART_EVENT_KILL

parameters.name: Cooldown Minimum
parameters.description: If set (along with cooldown max), event will NOT trigger more OFTEN than between min - max milliseconds (randomly)

parameters.name: Cooldown Maximum
parameters.description: If set (along with cooldown min), event will NOT trigger more OFTEN than between min - max milliseconds (randomly)

parameters.name: Player only
parameters.description: If false, only creatures will trigger the event, if true, only player will trigger the event

parameters.name: Creature
parameters.description: Takes into account only if "Player only" is True

description: On kill {pram3value:choose(0):creature {pram4}|player} {pram1value:choose(0):|(wait {pram1} - {pram2} ms before next trigger of this event)}

name: SMART_EVENT_SPELLHIT

description: On {pram1value:choose(0):any spell|spell {pram1}}{pram2value:choose(0):| of school {pram2}} hit {pram3value:choose(0):|(wait {pram3} - {pram4} ms before next trigger)}
